pullRequest.title: Creation of an EE 9 feature pack and dist, based on transformation of artifacts using EE 8 APIs
pullRequest.bodyText: Time to get what I've been doing out there. I'll post to the dev list with more details tomorrow.

commit.message: [WFLY-13663] Clean up deps on javax.xml.rpc.api module
Set up EE 9 feature pack and dist build infrastructure. Create standard configs without JSR77, picketbox/picketlink or embedded messaging broker.
Enable EE8->EE9 transformation of the server during provisioning
Implement input stream (i.e. non-scanner) transformation of EE apps to EE 9
Add transformation to the build-feature-pack execution

Update the EE 9 feature pack to use the Eclipse EE 9 API milestone artifacts

I anticipate some of these we will need to switch back to JBoss spec forks, but initially I'm switching almost all
[WFLY-13729] Make optional the javax.sml.rpc.api module dependency added to deployments by EjbDependencyDeploymentUnitProcessor
Set up basic test infrastructure for running testing against the EE 9 dist.
[WFLY-13730] Work around problem by hiding requirement relationship from Galleon
In the EE 9 feature pack move a number of EE impls to the version used in the first EE 9 Glassfish milestone
[WFLY-13717] Replace the mail server expressions before running XML validation against the EE 9 dist configs
[WFLY-13742] In the EE 9 dist include an example config that includes an embedded broker

Revert "[WFLY-13730] Work around problem by hiding requirement relationship from Galleon"

This reverts commit babb382b7738ca273cb75d91716569859b347a51.
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into ee-9
[WFLY-13730] Work around problem by hiding requirement relationship from Galleon
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into ee-9
Move back to the JBoss spec forks for JAXRS and JAXB

Allow testsuite/integration/ws execution with the ts.ee9 profile

Some tests are excluded pending resolution of security integration issues. Others depend on the legacy security subsystem and likely will never work.

Allow testsuite/integration/basic execution with the ts.ee9 profile

Numerous tests are excluded for various reasons, e.g. no embedded JMS, no legacy security. But there is also a general TODO to resolve why some tests don't pass.
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into ee-9
Move jsf-impl version to 3.0.0.SP01 in the EE 9 feature pack
Merge branch 'pullRequest53' into ee-9-pr53

Exclude jsf ForbiddenUrlTestCase as the test assume EE8-specific URL patterns that are not available with an EE9 JSF impl

Also fixes a typo in another exclude
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into ee-9
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into ee-9
Enable various webservices tests following WFLY-12765 allowing them to pass with no legacy security subsystem present
[WFLY-13788] Provide an Externalizer for SessionContextImpl

Allow testsuite/integration/clustering execution with the ts.ee9 profile

Some tests are excluded for various reasons
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into ee-9
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into ee-9
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into ee-9
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into ee-9
[WFLY-13806] Add subsystem parsing of persistence.xml documents in the EE 9 namespace
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into ee-9
Use provided scope for EE 9 feature pack dependencies

Use JBoss Metadata 14.0.0.Alpha1 in the EE 9 feature pack

This brings in JBMETA-419 to allow parsing off some EE 9 deployment descriptors
Merge commit '77710f67aa2a9ca1b4108770e6e13131ad4fb028' into ee-9_pre_protostream
Adapt ee-9 messaging configurations to updates in 21.0.0.Beta1
Exclude JdrReportManagmentTestCase until failure is corrected (WFLY-13884)
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into ee-9
Next is 21.0.0.Final (ee-9 modules)
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into ee-9
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into ee-9
Switch to use Batavia Facade API instead of Eclipse transformer directly.

Merge pull request #54 from ropalka/batavia

Switch to use Batavia Facade API instead of Eclipse transformer directly
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into ee-9
Move back to the JBoss spec fork for JACC
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into ee-9
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into ee-9
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into ee-9
Next is 22.0.0.Beta1 (ee-9 modules)
Merge branch 'WFLY-13972' into ee-9
Upgrade various EE 9 override versions to newer releases
Merge branch 'master' into ee-9
[WFLY-13994] Share the distribution config file and XSD validation code between the dist modules
[WFLY-13994] Add updated variants of excluded schemas to the EXCLUDED_SCHEMA_FILES set
[WFLY-13994] AbstractValidationUnitTest's LSResourceResolver should resolve from the jboss.dist.dir
Merge branch 'WFLY-13994' into WFLY-13994_ee9
[WFLY-13994] Use the shared base class for the ee-9/dist xml validation tests
Upgrade to Galleon plugins 5.0.0.Alpha4, transformation only occurs during FP build.
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into ee-9

Merge pull request #55 from jfdenise/ee-9-single-tx

Upgrade to Galleon plugins 5.0.0.Alpha4, transformation only occurs during FP build
Merge branch 'WFLY-14008' into WFLY-14008_ee9
[WFLY-14008] Provide the JAX-RPC API to the EJB subsystem via the javax.xml.rpc.api.internal module so reflection on the SessionContextImpl class will not fail.

Move back to the traditional names for the host.xml files.

Using the EE 9 variant of WF as a way to introduce changes like changing these file names may be a good idea, but it should be discussed more, not done as just one change amongst a large set.
Fix method name typo
Merge branch 'master' into ee-9
[WFLY-14008] Provide the JAX-RPC API to the EJB subsystem via the javax.xml.rpc.api.internal module so reflection on the SessionContextImpl class will not fail.
Merge branch 'master' into ee-9
Merge branch 'WFLY-13994_ee9' into ee-9
Merge branch 'WFLY-14008_ee9' into ee-9
Remove unneeded dep on the wildfly-servlet feature pack from the EE 9 feature pack
Merge branch 'master' into ee-9
Ensure the org.wildfly.deployment.transformation module is present when a slimmed server is provisioned

Incorporate the MP Fault Tolerance, JWT and Open API functionality in the EE 9 feature pack
Include standalone-microprofile.xml and standalone-microprofile-ha.xml configs
Run the microprofile and microprofile-tck test suites against server using the EE 9 feature pack
Change the name of the new feature pack to wildfly-preview to allow its use to evolve over time
Merge branch 'master' into ee-9
Merge branch 'master' into ee-9
Allow testsuite/layers execution with the ts.ee9 profile
[WFLY-14408] Consolidate duplicated Galleon config boilerplate in testsuite/layers/pom.xml
Use the 'preview' name for the distribution release files
Partial rvert of commit id: c34e945d - absence of marshalling.api is not causing issues any more

Merge pull request #57 from ropalka/ee-9

Partial rvert of commit id: c34e945d - absence of marshalling.api is not causing issues any more

Revert "[WFLY-13788] Provide an Externalizer for SessionContextImpl"

This reverts commit 232adc169d46da7962729aa2372f1dd9b2a3f583.
Merge branch 'master' into ee-9

nodes.bodyText: Copyright date should probably be 2020 for a new file
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,156 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+
+<!--
+  ~ JBoss, Home of Professional Open Source.
+  ~ Copyright 2010, Red Hat, Inc., and individual contributors

nodes.bodyText: Copyright date should be updated to 2020 throughout the pr

Copyright date needs an update.
This pr is really great Brian, thanks for pulling this all together in WF for all of us to benefit from!
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,130 @@
+/*
+ * JBoss, Home of Professional Open Source.
+ * Copyright 2010, Red Hat Middleware LLC, and individual contributors

nodes.bodyText: I noticed jakarta.batch:jakarta.batch-api:jar:2.0.0 is listed on https://jakarta.ee/specifications/batch/2.0, I switched locally to <version.jakarta.batch.jakarta.batch-api>2.0.0</version.jakarta.batch.jakarta.batch-api> and could build.  So we probably can update the others as well (we just have to look up the exact version).
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,1182 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+
+<!--
+  ~ /*
+  ~  * JBoss, Home of Professional Open Source.
+  ~  * Copyright $year Red Hat, Inc., and individual contributors
+  ~  * as indicated by the @author tags.
+  ~  *
+  ~  * Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
+  ~  * you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
+  ~  * You may obtain a copy of the License at
+  ~  *
+  ~  *     http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+  ~  *
+  ~  * Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
+  ~  * distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
+  ~  * WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
+  ~  * See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
+  ~  * limitations under the License.
+  ~  */
+  -->
+
+<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
+         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
+    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+
+    <parent>
+        <groupId>org.wildfly</groupId>
+        <artifactId>wildfly-ee-9-parent</artifactId>
+        <!--
+        Maintain separation between the artifact id and the version to help prevent
+        merge conflicts between commits changing the GA and those changing the V.
+        -->
+        <version>22.0.0.Beta1-SNAPSHOT</version>
+    </parent>
+    
+    <artifactId>wildfly-preview-feature-pack</artifactId>
+
+    <name>WildFly: EE 9 Preview Galleon Feature Pack</name>
+    <description>Tech Preview Galleon feature pack providing full platform Jakarta EE 9 functionality</description>
+    <packaging>pom</packaging>
+
+    <properties>
+        <license.directory>${project.build.directory}/resources/content/docs/licenses</license.directory>
+        <mp.galleon.common.resources.directory>${basedir}/../../microprofile/galleon-common/src/main/resources</mp.galleon.common.resources.directory>
+        <mp.license.directory>${basedir}/../../microprofile/galleon-common/src/license</mp.license.directory>
+        <full.common.resources.directory>${basedir}/../../ee-feature-pack/common/src/main/resources</full.common.resources.directory>
+        <full.galleon-common.resources.directory>${basedir}/../../ee-feature-pack/galleon-common/src/main/resources</full.galleon-common.resources.directory>
+        <full.common.license.directory>${basedir}/../../ee-feature-pack/common/src/license</full.common.license.directory>
+        <servlet.common.resources.directory>${basedir}/../../servlet-feature-pack/common/src/main/resources</servlet.common.resources.directory>
+        <servlet.galleon-common.resources.directory>${basedir}/../../servlet-feature-pack/galleon-common/src/main/resources</servlet.galleon-common.resources.directory>
+        <servlet.common.license.directory>${basedir}/../../servlet-feature-pack/common/src/license</servlet.common.license.directory>
+        <full.ee-9-api.license.directory>${basedir}/src/license</full.ee-9-api.license.directory>
+
+
+        <version.com.sun.faces>3.0.0.SP01</version.com.sun.faces>
+        <version.com.sun.activation.jakarta.activation>2.0.0-RC3</version.com.sun.activation.jakarta.activation>
+        <version.jakarta.annotation.jakarta-annotation-api>2.0.0-RC1</version.jakarta.annotation.jakarta-annotation-api>
+        <version.jakarta.authorization.jakarta-authorization-api>2.0.0-RC1</version.jakarta.authorization.jakarta-authorization-api>
+        <version.jakarta.batch.jakarta.batch-api>2.0.0-M6</version.jakarta.batch.jakarta.batch-api>

nodes.bodyText: Should we add a comment here that mentions https://github.com/jboss/jboss-jakarta-el-api_spec as an option to consider?

commit.message: Update EE 9 dependencies to most recent versions
Merge branch 'master' into ee-9
Correct the copyright declarations in the ee-9 modules
Upgrade galleon-plugins to 5.0.0.Beta1

Merge pull request #58 from jfdenise/ee-9

Upgrade galleon-plugins to 5.0.0.Beta1

nodes.bodyText: This is fine.  I can look into this after this is merged.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1902,5 +1901,61 @@
             </build>
         </profile>
 
+        <!-- Test against EE 9 dist -->
+        <profile>
+            <id>ee9.profile</id>
+            <activation>
+                <property>
+                    <name>ts.ee9</name>
+                </property>
+            </activation>
+                <build>
+                <plugins>
+                    <plugin>
+                        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
+                        <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
+                        <executions>
+                            <execution>
+                                <id>ts.surefire.clustering.ha</id>
+                                <!--<phase>none</phase>-->
+                                <configuration>
+                                    <excludes>
+                                        <!-- This next section is a duplication of the usual excludes from the ts.clustering.cluster.ha.profile.
+                                             TODO figure out how to avoid this -->
+                                        <exclude>${test-group}/**/ejb/stateful/*TestCase.java</exclude>
+                                        <exclude>${test-group}/**/group/*TestCase.java</exclude>
+                                        <exclude>${test-group}/**/jms/*TestCase.java</exclude>
+                                        <exclude>${test-group}/**/web/remote/*TestCase.java</exclude>
+                                        <exclude>${test-group}/**/sso/remote/*TestCase.java</exclude>
+                                        <!-- These are run by ts.clustering.cluster.byteman.profile -->
+                                        <exclude>${test-group}/**/byteman/*TestCase.java</exclude>
+                                        <exclude>%regex[${test-group}/(${ts.surefire.clustering.ha.additionalExcludes})/.*TestCase.class]</exclude>
+
+                                        <!-- Requires legacy security subsystem -->
+                                        <exclude>${test-group}/web/authentication/*TestCase.java</exclude>
+                                        <!-- TODO see why these aren't working and fix or exclude with a clear explanation -->
+                                        <exclude>${test-group}/ejb/remote/GlobalAuthContextRemoteStatelessEJBFailoverTestCase.java</exclude>
+                                        <exclude>${test-group}/ejb/remote/ThreadAuthContextRemoteStatelessEJBFailoverTestCase.java</exclude>
+                                        <exclude>${test-group}/jsf/JSFFailoverTestCase.java</exclude> <!-- test hard-codes javax package; need to parameterize -->
+                                        <exclude>${test-group}/sso/*TestCase.java</exclude><!-- Perhaps ElytronSSOServerSetupTask needs to deal with the EJB application-security-domain too? -->
+                                    </excludes>
+                                </configuration>
+                            </execution>
+                            <execution>
+                                <id>ts.surefire.clustering.ha-infinispan-server</id>
+                                <!--<phase>none</phase>-->
+                                <configuration>
+                                    <excludes>
+                                        <!-- TODO see why these aren't working and fix or exclude with a clear explanation -->
+                                        <exclude>${test-group}/sso/remote/*TestCase.java</exclude><!-- Perhaps ElytronSSOServerSetupTask needs to deal with the EJB application-security-domain too? -->

nodes.bodyText: This is fine.  Let's file follow-up jiras to track these individual investigations.
nodes.diffHunk:

commit.message: Merge branch 'master' into ee-9
